text: Grzegorz Piwowarski (born 4 December 1971) is a Polish former cyclist. He competed in the team time trial at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Poland Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Golub-Dobrzyń Category:Sportspeople from Kuyavian-Pomeranian Voivodeship
title: Grzegorz Piwowarski
